mapper.select: select prod_bigcategory, prod_category from product group by prod_bigcategory, prod_category order by prod_bigcategory
select prod_category, count(*) r_ from product where prod_bigcategory = #{param1} group by prod_category order by prod_category
select * from ( select a.*, rownum r_ from ( select * from product order by prod_regdate desc ) a where rownum < 9 ) where r_ >= 1

select * from ( select a.*, rownum r_ from ( select a.prod_img, a.prod_code, a.prod_name, a.prod_price, a.prod_discount, count(b.product_code) review_count from product a, review b where a.prod_code = b.product_code group by a.prod_img, a.prod_code, a.prod_name, a.prod_price, a.prod_discount order by count(b.product_code) desc ) a where rownum < 9 ) where r_ >= 1
